reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app collects data and explains how it is used.

Effective date: 07/23/2023
Welcome to Deep Meditate, Inc.
Deep Meditate, Inc. ("us", "we", or "our") operates https://mindfuly.app and Mindfuly mobile application (hereinafter referred to as "Service").
Our Privacy Policy governs your visit to https://mindfuly.app and Mindfuly mobile application, and explains how we collect, safeguard and disclose information that results from your use of our Service.
We use your data to provide and improve Service. By using Service, you agree to the collection ...

more, visit the official California Legislative Information website. The CCPA took effect on 01/01/2020.
We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service ("Service Providers"), provide Service on our behalf, perform Service-related services or assist us in analysing how our Service is used.
These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.
We may use third...

manage projects, and build software.
For more information on what data GitHub collects for what purpose and how the protection of the data is ensured, please visit GitHub Privacy Policy page: https://help.github.com/en/articles/github-privacy-statement.
We may provide paid products and/or services within Service. In that case, we use third-party services for payment processing (e.g. payment processors).
We will not store or collect your payment card details. That information is provided directly...

correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your Personal Data.
If you wish to be informed what Personal Data we hold about you and if you want it to be removed from our systems, please email us at [email protected].

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects Personal Data and Usage Data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the collection of Personal Data and Usage Data by the app.

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use in the Privacy Policy.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that it governs the collection, use, and disclosure of information resulting from the use of the Service, indicating that the purpose of data collection and use is declared.

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt-out of data collection or request the deletion of their data by sending a request to the provided email address.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users can exercise their data protection rights by requesting the deletion or limiting the use of their personal data.
reply.reference: If you wish to be informed what Personal Data we hold about you and if you want it to be removed from our systems, please email us at [email protected]. - URL: https://mindfuly.app/legal/privacy-policy/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties for various purposes such as providing services, analytics, and payment processing.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may use third-party companies and individuals to facilitate the service, analyze service usage, and provide various services including payment processing. The app also mentions specific third-party service providers like Firebase, GitHub, Apple Store, Google Play, and Stripe for different purposes such as analytics and payment processing.
reply.reference: We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service ('Service Providers'), provide Service on our behalf, perform Service-related services or assist us in analyzing how our Service is used. These third parties have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose. URL: https://mindfuly.app/legal/privacy-policy/.

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with Firebase, GitHub, Apple Store In-App Payments, Google Play In-App Payments, and Stripe.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the specific third-party services the app shares data with in the context of providing services, payment processing, and analytics.
reply.reference: Firebase; GitHub; Apple Store In-App Payments; Google Play In-App Payments; Stripe. URL: https://mindfuly.app/legal/privacy-policy/
